column4: I have an avi file that will not play in any player, when I try to open it with oggconvert it says The file format "None" is not supported?
try running this --> mencoder -forceidx -oac copy -ovc copy infile.avi -o outfile.avi
where infile.avi is the one with the problem and outfile is anything
this is supposed to be a divx file, but that command said this file format is not recognized?
